price: Então, aniquilamos os mais temíveis que eles; e já precedeu exemplo dos antepassados.
arabic: فَأَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا وَمَضَىٰ مَثَلُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: fa-ahlaknā ashadda min'hum baṭshan wamaḍā mathalu al-awalīna
